page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {CRIME, POLICE, COURTS. { {CRIME :}FROM 1983 TO 1985 THE CRIME RATE HAS RISEN BY 32%.VANDALISM IS THE MOST COMMON CRIME.CRIMES RELATED TO RECKLESS CONDUCT ROSE MASSIVELY.MURDER IS VERY RARE AND TRAFFIC OFENCES REDUCING,BUT DRUG RELATED CRIMES HAVE RISEN BY 30%. {POLICE :}THERE IS ONE LARGE POLICE STATION IN OUR AREA.MOST POLICING IS DONE USING CARS,BUT EFFORTS ARE BEING MADE TO REINTRODUCE THE BEAT POLICEMAN ON FOOT. {COURTS :}THERE ARE NO COURTS IN OUR AREA AND MINOR OFFENCES ARE DEALT WITH AT THE NEAREST(10 KM) SHERIFF COURT WHILE MAJOR CRIMES ARE TRIED IN THE HIGH COURT IN EDINBURGH.
